contentList.content:
Blast a violent wind, cleansing all Surfaces.

Those hit by the blast are dealt [1] and are executed if they are Suffocating and have less than 15% Vitality.

Survivors of the blast lose their footing and begin Suffocating.

Setting Lost Footing on an enemy who already has Lost Footing will set Knocked Down if either Armour type is depleted.

Blast wind in a cone, Suffocating and dealing [1] to enemies. Also applies Lost Footing to enemies.

Setting Lost Footing on an enemy who already has Lost Footing will set Knocked Down if either Armour type is depleted.

Blast wind in a cone, Suffocating and dealing [1] to enemies. Also applies Lost Footing to enemies.

Setting Lost Footing on an enemy who already has Lost Footing will set Knocked Down if either Armour type is depleted.
Thunder resonates through the loudest of souls. Perhaps I can teach ye the ways of a real Aerotheurge...
I've a feeling ye'll be needin' some more tutelage soon. Come back once ye've got the coin.
L'esquive et la vitesse de déplacement sont augmentées.
L'esquive et la vitesse de déplacement de vos alliés proches sont augmentées.
Character's movement speed is increased and is Floating.
Character's movement speed is increased and is Floating.

Warp to target location, dealing [1] to and Shocking all characters upon landing.

Conductive:
Hitting a Conductive enemy causes this skill to deal [2] to non-Conductive enemies within [3].

Jump from one enemyto up to 2 other nearby enemies, dealing [1] and Shocking all hit this way.

Conductive:
Hitting a Conductive enemy causes this skill to deal [2] to non-Conductive enemies within [3].
Le personnage est un conduit pour les compétences électriques.
Hitting enemies with melee hits will cause shocking volts to be striken off at nearby enemies. Volts can fork up to 2 times.

Shoot a bolt of lightning, forking up to [4] times in an [5] radius, dealing [1] to each enemy hit.

Conductive:
Hitting a Conductive enemy causes this skill to deal [2] to non-Conductive enemies within [3].

An electrical jolt deals [1] to target character. This skill electrifies surfaces and sets Shocked.

Conductive:
Hitting a Conductive enemy causes this skill to deal [2] to non-Conductive enemies within [3].

Portée : [4]
Étourdissement empêche la cible de bouger ou d'agir.
Peut cibler des surfaces ou des nuages pour les électrifier.

Portée : [4]
Étourdissement empêche la cible de bouger ou d'agir.
Peut cibler des surfaces ou des nuages pour les électrifier.

An electrical jolt deals [1] to target character. This skill electrifies surfaces and sets Shocked.

Hitting a Conductive enemy causes this skill to deal an additional [2] to the target and to enemies within [3].

Strike the earth with your hammer, forging and launching a projectile which deals [1].

The projectile forks to up to [2] times to enemies within [3].

Hurl 3 spheres of electricity towards targets of your choice, dealing [1] and applying Shocked to each target.

Each sphere electrifies surfaces.

Conductive:
Hitting a Conductive enemy creates a small Electrified Steam Cloud around them.

Shoot forking sparks at all enemies around you, each dealing [1] and applying Shocked.

Conductive:
Hitting a Conductive enemy causes this skill to deal [2] to non-Conductive enemies within [3].

An electrical bolt falls from the sky, dealing [1] all characters in the area. This skill electrifies surfaces and sets Shocked.

Conductive:
Hitting a Conductive enemy causes this skill to deal [2] to non-Conductive enemies within [3].

Enemies hit by the Conductive effect of this skill are also Dazed, reducing Air Resistance by [4]% and increasing AP costs by [5] for 1 turn.

Deals [1] to all nearby <font color='#aa3938'>enemies</font>. Additionally, you gain <font color='#7d71d9'>Blinding Radiance</font>, <font color='#dbdbdb'>Blinding</font> <font color='#aa3938'>enemies</font> within 5m without <font color='#188ede'>Magic Armour</font>.

Let out a volatile shout, dealing [1] and creating Electrified Steam Clouds around you and nearby enemies.

Also applies Breathing Bubble, causing you to ignore all Cloud Surfaces for 3 turns. Additionally, you also gain Suffocating, Shocked, Stunned, and Silenced immunities for its duration.

Gain Air Immunity for 1 turn before detonating a sphere of electrical energy, dealing [1] and Shocking nearby enemies.

This skill leaves behind a ring of Cursed Electrified Steam Clouds.

Shift the winds, gaining Evasive Aura.

Allies who enter the aura become Evasive, granting 90% Dodging and +1 Movement.

Control the forces of nature, removing Petrified, Slowed, and Stunned from allies.

Gain Stratuswalk Aura, granting you and nearby allies +1.5 Movement as well as the ability to Float above ground surfaces.

Unleash a thundering roar, dealing [1] and creating Electrified Steam Clouds around you and hit enemies.

Also applies Breathing Bubble to you and your allies, causing all to ignore Cloud Surfaces for 3 turns. Additionally, allies also gain Suffocating, Shocked, Stunned, and Silenced immunities for its duration.

Conceal nearby allies by creating Blessed Smoke Clouds, each lasting 1 turn.

Blessed Smoke Clouds grant Invisibility and remove Silenced.
Push nearby <font color='#aa3938'>enemies</font> away from you with a forceful blast, dealing [1] and applying <font color="#797980">Suffocating</font>.

Channel your power, adding [1] to your weapon attacks and skills.

Basic attacks will Shock characters for 1 turn if they are not already Shocked.

Gain Voltstriker, causing melee attacks to bounce a bolt from the initial target, dealing [1] to the closest enemy.

This buff is overwitten by any other Striker/Master statuses.
Create a <font color='#639594'>Smoke Cloud</font> around you, lasting 1 turn and hiding you from sight.

Deal [1] to nearby enemies and create a Vacuum Aura around you.

Enemies who enter the aura become Silenced and begin Suffocating.

Muster a volatile stormcloud over target area, lasting for 1 turn.

Lightning bolts crash from the stormcloud on-cast and on-turn at up to 7 enemies, each Stunning and dealing [1] in a 3m radius.

Fabricate a Wind Elemental at target location. The Elemental lasts 5 turns and is a ranged caster.

At 10 Summoning, the Elemental increases in size and gains additional stats.
| Conjure two linked gateways that allow any character to instantly travel between them. |

Open a wormhole at target location, transporting items into your inventory.

Enemies without Magic Armour become affected by Gravity, preventing them from moving.
Target character becomes <font color='#7d71d9'>Evasive</font>, granting <font color='#7d71d9'>90% Dodging</font> and <font color='#40b606'>+1 Movement</font>.

Target a Shocked or Stunned character.

Remove those statuses and apply Conductive for 2 turns, reducing their Air Resistance by [1]%.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Hitting a Conductive enemy with certain Aerotheurge skills cause them to fork a portion of air damage to nearby non-Conductive enemies within 8m.
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Target character becomes Conductive, reducing their Air Resistance by [1]%.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Hitting a Conductive enemy with certain Aerotheurge skills cause them to fork a portion of air damage to nearby non-Conductive enemies within 8m.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
| Transport pickupable items in target area to your inventory |

Haze all characters in target area, causing a persistant mist to follow them and obscure their vision.

Whilst Hazed, targets have [1]% Air Resistance and [2]% Accuracy.

Enchant your target with a charged barrier for 2 turns, providing +1.5 Movement and [2]% Air Resistance at the cost of [3]% Earth Resistance.

Removes Wet, Shocked, Stunned, and Frozen upon cast.

Whilst enchanted, the target is immune from Stunned and Suffocating.

Target gains Voltmaster, causing melee attacks to bounce bolts from the initial target, dealing [1] to the closest enemy.

Voltmaster is also applied to allies near this skills target.

Voltmaster bolts bounce up to 2 times and may bounce back to the initial target.

Deal [1] to target enemy and conjure a Cloud Surface around them based on any statuses they may have:

- Bleeding: Electrified Blood Cloud
- Poison: Poison Cloud
- Shocked: Electrified Steam Cloud
- Other: Smoke Cloud.

Haze all characters in target area, causing a persistant mist to follow them and obscure their vision.

Whilst Hazed, targets have [1]% Air Resistance and [2]% Accuracy.

Lightning strikes the earth, deal [1] to enemies in target area.

Vaporises Ground Surfaces into Cloud Surfaces, with the exception of Oil, Ice, and Lava.

Hitting a Conductive enemy causes this skill to deal an additional [2] to the target and to enemies within [3].

Create an updraft at target location, dealing [1] and applying Lost Footing to all enemies in the area.

Setting Lost Footing on an enemy who already has Lost Footing will set Knocked Down if either Armour type is depleted.

Wind clears the air, dealing [1] to enemies and dousing flames in target area.

Condenses targetted Cloud Surfaces in the area, morphing them into Ground Surfaces.

Enemies also begin Suffocating.

Target and Shock a nearby character, dealing [1].

The target also becomes Conductive, reducing their Air Resistance by [4]%.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Hitting a Conductive enemy with certain Aerotheurge skills cause them to fork a portion of air damage to nearby non-Conductive enemies within 8m.
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Portée : [1]
Étourdissement empêche la cible de bouger ou d'agir.
Suck the air out of the target, dealing [1]. Also sets <font color="#cfecff">Silenced</font> and <font color="#797980">Suffocating</font>.

Lightning strikes the earth, dealing [1] to enemies in target area.

Vaporises Ground Surfaces into Cloud Surfaces, aside from Oil, Ice, and Lava.

Conductive:
Hitting a Conductive enemy causes this skill to deal [2] to non-Conductive enemies within [3].

Set Erratic Wisp on the target, causing them to teleport in random direction whenever they are attacked.

Also increases Air Resistance by [1]%.

If the target is an ally, they gain Hawkeye, providing +2m Range for 2 turns.
Throw an item or character up high and drop it to the ground, dealing [1].

Target range: [2]
Target can be moved [3] away from its position.

Select item or character first, then select its destination.
Échange les places de deux personnages. Vous pouvez être l'un d'eux.

An uncontrollable tornado sweeps the battlefield, applying Suffocating and Lost Footing to enemies.

The tornado clears all Surfaces in its wake.

Removes Invisible, Burning, Poisoned, and Slowed from all characters.

Command a wicked bolt in target direction, dealing [1] to characters and leaving behind a trail of Electrified Steam Clouds.

Conductive:
Hitting a Conductive enemy causes this skill to deal [2] to non-Conductive enemies within [3].
